text: Archibald Ritchie (11 May 1894 – 24 November 1973) was a Scottish footballer who played for Stenhousemuir, Dumbarton, Rangers and Derby County. ==References== Category:1894 births Category:1973 deaths Category:Scottish footballers Category:Dumbarton F.C. players Category:Rangers F.C. players Category:Derby County F.C. players Category:Stenhousemuir F.C. players Category:Scottish Football League players Category:English Football League players Category:Association football defenders Category:Denny Hibernian F.C. players Category:Scottish Junior Football Association players
title: Archibald Ritchie (footballer, born 1894)
